extension.name: Unite Nivo Slider
extension.author: Unite CMS
extension.description:
Unite Nivo Slider module. Put nivo slider on any page. This module uses nivo slider component for slides select.

 Need support? Please visit the Nivo Slider Support Page
 you'll find there all the information you need.

Liked the slider? Check out the Unite Nivo Slider PRO

ver. 2.1

field.name: sliderid
field.label: Slider
field.description: Choose a slider from the component

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Sets the Size of the Slider Images. Padding, shadows etc will added from this size.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Sets the Size of the Slider Images. Padding, shadows etc will added from this size.

field.name: pauseTime
field.label: Pause Time
field.description: How long each slide will show

field.name: animSpeed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Slide transition speed

field.name: effect
field.label: Custom Effects
field.description: The slide effect. Can choose several effects per slider, if no effects selected, it will be 'random'

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme (folder list)
field.description: The theme, you can find the themes CSS under /modules/mod_unite_nivoslider/tmpl/themes and edit their CSS as you like. Note - to create a new custom theme, just copy some folder to a new folder, and it will appear in the list

field.name: controlNav
field.label: Control Nav
field.description: 1,2,3... navigation

field.name: directionNav
field.label: Direction Nav
field.description: Next and Prev navigation buttons

field.name: prevText
field.label: Prev Text
field.description: Prev directionNav text

field.name: nextText
field.label: Next Text
field.description: Next directionNav text

field.name: position
field.label: Carousel Position
field.description: The position of the slider. Center is margin:0px auto; left / right is float:left and float:right. The left and right margin valid only for float positions accordingly.

field.name: margin_left
field.label: Left Margin
field.description: Space from left. Works only if left / right position set.

field.name: margin_right
field.label: Right Margin
field.description: Space from right. Works only if left / right position set.

field.name: margin_top
field.label: Top Margin
field.description: Space from top

field.name: margin_bottom
field.label: Bottom Margin
field.description: Space from bottom

field.name: clear_both
field.label: Add Clear Both
field.description: Add clear:both div to the end of the slider html. It removes the floating position.

field.name: startSlide
field.label: Start Slide
field.description: Set starting Slide (0 index)

field.name: randomStart
field.label: Random Start
field.description: Start on a random slide

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Stop animation while hovering

field.name: manualAdvance
field.label: Manual Advance
field.description: Force manual transitions (the slides will change only menually from user js api call)

field.name: slices
field.label: Slices
field.description: For slice animations

field.name: boxCols
field.label: Box Columns
field.description: For box animations

field.name: boxRows
field.label: Box Rows
field.description: For box animations

field.name: beforeChange
field.label: beforeChange
field.description: Triggers before a slide transition

field.name: afterChange
field.label: afterChange
field.description: Triggers after a slide transition

field.name: slideshowEnd
field.label: slideshowEnd
field.description: Triggers after all slides have been shown

field.name: lastSlide
field.label: lastSlide
field.description: Triggers when last slide is shown

field.name: afterLoad
field.label: afterLoad
field.description: Triggers when slider has loaded

field.name: include_jquery
field.label: Include jQuery 1.7 js
field.description: Add include of jquery js. If you have jquery include in other module, and you don't want to double include, choose 'No'

field.name: js_load_type
field.label: Include nivo_slider.js in
field.description: The right way is to include the js to the head section, but on some cases when you have double jquery loading, you can make it work by changing into body

field.name: no_conflict_mode
field.label: No Conflict Mode
field.description: Run jQuery.noConflict() function. If you have some other js libraries that not working good, you can try this option.
